dimensions: Warp x Weft: 61 x 72 cm (24 x 28 3/8 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (for black, purple, brown and 2 reds, including madder) and dye (yellow) applied by brush or pen. Blue applied by brush over resist. (chintz)
description: Very loose diamond lattice made up of flowering vines and fruits, in black, brown, blue, purple, red, and pink on a white ground.
name: Chintz
